title: Super Daddy Bedtime Questions: An illustrated Super Bedtime Story for Super Daddies and their Super Sons...
description: A funny illustrated question and answer session between a young boy and his daddy just before bedtime! The boy asks his daddy whether he has various superpowers and gets sweet and funny responses... This is a great bedtime story and offers a great bonding opportunity and great fun between a father and a son! Perhaps being a dad really is a superpower!!!
author: Nicolas Pavlou
